H0.text: When is Labour Day in the USA, Bermuda and Canada. First Monday in September

H1.text: When is Labour Day in the USA, Bermuda and Canada. May 1st

H2.text: When is Labour Day in the USA, Bermuda and Canada. Last Monday in August

H3.text: When is Labour Day in the USA, Bermuda and Canada. Laborday

A4.text: Labor Day is a federal holiday in the United States celebrated on the first Monday of September to honor and recognize the American labor movement and the works and contributions of laborers to the development and achievements in the United States.

A5.text: Canada's Labour Day is also celebrated on the first Monday of September.
